title: Permanently banned for third party software??
body: The first time logging in since around 2017 and ive been banned for third party software, after looking at my account match history it turns out someone had hijacked and hacked my account and used third-party software. What's the next step? is there any way I can get my account back at all?

replies.body: [** File a support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), that's the only way to get in direct contact with Riot and discuss the situation. As long as you can prove it wasn't you playing those games, you should get some positive results. Good luck!
Tons of this lately, if your account was hijacked you have a good chance of getting it back if you contact support and explain.
What's wrong with the thread you made 43 minutes ago that's still on the first page?
